Name: Burning Horns: A Bara Isekai JRPG
About the game: After being summoned by Zafir to the world of Burning Horns, Diego, a firefighter student from SÃ£o Paulo, see himself in a magical realm. In this place, humans and humanoid beings, such as elves, satyrs, and merfolk, have always experienced free love without prejudice among equals. However, today these people struggle to maintain their lifestyle and survive the threat posed by Onoob Asrol, a realm-riding demon who wants to turn everyone against the kingdom, and his shadows. Classic JRPG; Unique playable characters; Level up system; Party system; Immersive world; An adventure in which Diego learns spells from his rainbow insignia;
